subject: Basketball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: The All-Star Blake Griffin and the rookie guards Kyrie Irving and Ricky Rubio headline the list of 18 players chosen for the Rising Stars Challenge to be held during N.B.A. All-Star weekend.
snippet: The All-Star Blake Griffin and the rookie guards Kyrie Irving and Ricky Rubio headline the list of 18 players chosen for the Rising Stars Challenge to be held during N.B.A. All-Star weekend.
